row.process: :SET &command# = 'java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm CreateDeploymentTarget -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ' :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ') :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-f "&UC4RB_RM_FOLDER#" -t "&UC4RB_RM_CUSTOM_TYPE#" ') :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-n "&UC4RB_RM_TARGET_NAME#" ') :IF &UC4RB_OWNER# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-o "&UC4RB_OWNER#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_ENV_ID# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-e "&UC4RB_RM_ENV_ID#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_AGENT_ID# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-a "&UC4RB_RM_AGENT_ID#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_FAIL_EXISTS# = "YES" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-fe') :ENDIF &command#
